metadata.title: CVE-2025-22145 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Carbon is an international PHP extension for DateTime. Application passingunsanitized user input to Carbon::setLocale are at risk of arbitrary fileinclude, if the application allows users to upload files with .phpextension in an folder that allows include or require to read it, then theyare at risk of arbitrary code ran on their servers. This vulnerability isfixed in 3.8.4 and 2.72.6.

criterions.comment: php-nesbot-carbon package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
